level.heading: Plans and reports to be made available to the public.

level.text: Agencies shall make all ADA plans and reports required under this unit available on their websites and shall provide copies to the public upon request.
The Office shall make all plans and reports required under this unit available on its website and shall provide copies to the public upon request.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-239
level.text: For Law 16-239, see notes following ยง 2-1431.01.
